description: A browser-based interactive narrative game that combines visual point-and-click interactions with classic text commands as players travel through six symbolic rooms exploring courage, freedom, wisdom, creativity, resilience, and love.
reflections: I designed the narrative world, six symbolic spaces, and dual interaction system (click-based UI + text commands), and implemented the core game logic and visual effects with pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript, which taught me how to balance storytelling depth, accessibility, and responsive interaction in a single-page experience.
